author: Interwire
title: Micro Vibration EMS Anti-Wrinkle Neck & Face Sculpting Massager Combats Aging!
text:
—
If one is tired of staring at ones wrinkles in the mirror and want to rejuvenate ones skin, check out the Anti-Wrinkle Face Massager device from Pure Skincare Co.!
Have a look at
https://www.pureskincareco.com
The innovative facial sculpting device uses Micro Vibration EMS technology to stimulate ones facial muscles, promote blood circulation, and increase collagen production for a more youthful complexion.
With online purchases available through the company’s website, the Anti-Wrinkle Face Massager is part of Pure Skincare Co.’s ongoing commitment to providing one with state-of-the-art beauty technology.
Get Fresher, Plumper Skin
A recent study published in the Journal of Skin Research and Technology shows that regular facial massage can have statistically significant effects on the appearance of aging, as it helps to lift and tighten ones skin while toning facial muscles. With the innovative device from Pure Skincare Co., one can help maintain fresher, plumper skin for longer.
“Our device helps individuals achieve firmer, sculpted facial contours and reduces signs of aging,” says a company spokesperson. “The massager works in a way that expensive creams, serums, and masks can’t do, and gives you a sense of renewed confidence in your appearance.”
Deep Clean & Nourish
Along with tightening facial muscles, the device offers deep cleaning and nourishment for skin, delivering positive and negative ions to ones skin through its in-built EMS micro-current. The massager is non-invasive and versatile, allowing for easy use at home with no recovery or downtime required.
While smoothing fine lines and wrinkles, the facial sculpting tool’s 160-degree bionic design and micro-vibration technology work to enhance ones natural contours and silhouette, while blue light therapy targets acne-causing bacteria to reduce breakouts and prevent blemishes.
Even Out Skin Tone
The device’s green light therapy setting works to even out ones skin tone, reduce hyperpigmentation, and leave skin looking radiant, and the LED photon function applies red light for smoother texture.
The device is suitable for all skin types and comes with a USB charger and user manual. Previous customers have positive reviews. “I’ve tried countless skincare products but this face massager is a game changer,” says Emily E. “It’s easy to use and my face looks and feels better than ever. Highly recommend it!”
Start seeing the difference regular facial massage can make to ones appearance with help from the experts at Pure Skincare Co.!
Find more details and order ones sculpting device at
https://bit.ly/3pNE4yf

author: admin_l6ma5gus
title: Fiesp opens registrations for free mentoring and training program exclusively for women - Pledge Times
text: 02/29/2024 – 19:11 The Federation of Industries of the State of São Paulo (Fiesp) will open registrations for another edition of the “Elas na Indústria” program. The initiative, which aims to mentor and train women seeking leadership positions or leading their own ventures in the industrial sector, has already trained more than 300 women from different states across the country. Those interested in joining the new class must register from March 8th to March 20th on the website [www.fiesp.com.br](http://www.fiesp.com.br). In three editions, the program registered a 280% increase in participation. An important highlight is the increase in the representation of black and brown women, which went from 16% in the first class to 24% in the third, reinforcing the commitment to racial equity. +Ibovespa rises 1% in February after losing 4.79% in January New class In this edition, “Elas na Indústria” will offer more than 400 places for participants. The program, created and carried out by Fiesp's Superior Women's Council (Confem), focuses on providing free mentoring and training, creating a conducive environment for the exchange of experiences between professionals who have followed inspiring paths in their careers. In total, participants will have six online sessions with mentors, covering fundamental aspects such as self-knowledge, identifying gaps and objectives, creating a support network and defining action plans to achieve significant results in their career or business. To apply, you must meet the following prerequisites: - Being a female employee of industrial companies in leadership positions or positions that precede leadership; - Being an entrepreneurial woman at the head of industrial businesses. #Fiesp #opens #registrations #free #mentoring #training #program #exclusively #women

author: Niklas Hecht
title: Mehr als jeden zweiten Tag ein Verkehrstoter in Hessen - eine Hauptursache
text:
Mehr als jeden zweiten Tag ein Verkehrstoter in Hessen – das ist die Hauptursache
2024 starben 198 Menschen bei Verkehrsunfällen in Hessen. Ein Bericht des Hessischen Statistischen Landesamts zeigt die Hauptgründe.
Wiesbaden – Mehr als jeden zweiten Tag stirbt in Hessen ein Mensch bei einem Verkehrsunfall. Im Jahr 2024 gab es 198 Verkehrstote, zehn mehr als im Jahr davor. Ein detaillierter Bericht des Hessischen Statistischen Landesamts gibt nun Einblicke in die Hintergründe der Verkehrsunfälle in Hessen.
Zuerst die harten Fakten: Die Polizei registrierte im Jahr 2024 in Hessen insgesamt 26.820 Verkehrsunfälle, sowohl mit als auch ohne Personenschaden. Bei 19.250 Unfällen davon wurden insgesamt 25.100 Menschen verletzt oder getötet.
Zwei Drittel aller Unfälle mit Personenschaden (12.180 Unfälle) ereignete sich innerhalb von Ortschaften. Dabei wurden 14.590 Menschen verletzt oder getötet, was mehr als die Hälfte der Verunglückten ausmacht. 61 Menschen, das sind 31 Prozent der insgesamt Getöteten, verloren innerhalb von Ortschaften ihr Leben.
Überhöhte Geschwindigkeit Hauptgründe für tödliche Unfälle in Hessen
Auf Landstraßen ereigneten sich 5.050 Unfälle mit Personenschaden (26 Prozent), bei denen 7.360 Personen (29 Prozent) verunglückten. Die Unfälle auf Landstraßen waren aber besonders tödlich, dort starben im vergangenen Jahr 109 Menschen.
Die restlichen Unfälle mit Personenschaden, 2.020 an der Zahl (11 Prozent), fanden auf Autobahnen statt. Dabei verunglückten 3.160 Menschen, von denen 28 starben.
Die Polizei identifizierte einen zu geringen Sicherheitsabstand grundsätzlich als häufigste Ursache für Unfälle mit Personenschaden. Dies traf auf 3.780 Unfälle zu, was 20 Prozent aller Unfälle mit Personenschaden entspricht. An zweiter Stelle stand das Missachten der Vorfahrt mit 3.350 Unfällen (17 Prozent) gefolgt von überhöhter Geschwindigkeit mit 3.020 Unfällen (16 Prozent).
Bei den tödlichen Unfällen sieht es etwas anders aus. Hier war überhöhte Geschwindigkeit die häufigste Ursache. 67 Menschen starben im Jahr 2024 wegen zu schnellen Fahrens, was 34 Prozent aller Verkehrstoten ausmacht. Außerorts betraf dies sogar 42 Prozent der Getöteten.
Motorradfahrer hatten in Hessen das höchste Risiko, bei einem Unfall zu sterben
Alkoholeinfluss führte bei 970 Unfällen zu Personenschäden, wobei 12 Menschen starben und 1.230 verletzt wurden. Alkohol spielte auch bei E-Scooter-Unfällen eine große Rolle. Im Jahr 2024 waren 83 E-Scooter-Fahrer alkoholisiert an Unfällen mit Personenschaden beteiligt. Es folgten 72 alkoholisierte Pedelec-Fahrer und 37 alkoholisierte Mofa- und Kraftradfahrer.
Bei vier von fünf Unfällen (82 Prozent) mit Personenschaden war mindestens ein Auto beteiligt. Fahrradfahrer waren an 4.120 Unfällen mit Personenschaden beteiligt, was 21 Prozent entspricht. Dabei starben 21 Menschen, die alle auf dem Fahrrad unterwegs waren.
Motorradfahrer hatten das höchste Risiko, bei einem Unfall zu sterben. Ihr Risiko war mehr als doppelt so hoch wie das aller Verkehrsteilnehmenden zusammen, mit 2,2 Getöteten je 100 Unfälle im Vergleich zu 1,0 Getöteten je 100 Unfälle. Obwohl Motorradfahrer an vergleichsweise wenigen Unfällen beteiligt waren, nämlich „nur“ an 1.840 (10 Prozent), starben dabei 44 Menschen, von denen 41 Motorradfahrer waren. (nhe/pm)

author: DENG MACHOL
title: 38 people killed and 52 wounded in communal clashes over land in South Sudan, officials report
text:
JUBA, South Sudan — Residents of a swampy area in central South Sudan battled with cattle herders who moved in looking for water and pasture during the dry season, and at least 38 people were killed and 52 suffered gunshot wounds, officials said Thursday.
The fighting started Wednesday and tensions remained high Thursday night, with officials reporting ''minor clashes'' and apprehension over revenge attacks in the remote area.
The information minister of Warrap state, William Wol Mayom, said fighting took place in the Alor area, which is in Lakes state and borders both Warrap and Unity states.
Mayom said security forces had been sent to calm the situation and to move the cattle herders away from the disputed wet lands.
''The violence has been de-escalated, but minor clashes are still being reported in inaccessible swampy areas and casualties cannot be fully verified,'' Mayom said.
A police spokesperson for Lakes state, Maj. Elijah Mabor Makuach, said 19 of the dead and 17 of the wounded were civilians from Warrap state and 19 of the dead and 35 wounded were from Lakes state.
Makuach said young herders from Warrap migrated to the Alor area with their cattle two weeks ago and began burning brush and the temporary shelters of residents. He said the herders were looking for pasture and water in the swampy lands of Alor.
The bloodshed came four days after at least 52 people, including a U.N. peacekeeper, were killed and 64 wounded by gunmen who attacked villagers in Abyei, an oil-rich region that is claimed by both Sudan and South Sudan. Officials said that violence also arose from a dispute over land.
South Sudan won its independence from Sudan in 2011 after more than 39 years of war and then plunged into a ruinous internal conflict from 2013 to 2018 that stagnated development. Many guns remain in the hands of civilians who fought in the conflicts.

author: mauro marines
title: Invita obispo Hilario González a sanar y restaurar la paz tras las elecciones
text: Invita obispo Hilario González a sanar y restaurar la paz tras las elecciones [Mauro Marines](/autor/-/meta/mauro-marines) Como uno de los primeros en la ciudad en acudir a las urnas, el obispo de [Saltillo](https://saltillo.gob.mx/), monseñor Hilario González, hizo un llamado a los ciudadanos a ejercer su derecho al voto, al tiempo que abordó algunos de los temas de fracturas y violencias que han ocurrido en esta temporada de elecciones. “Confiamos en que la paz, la armonía y la justicia se verán en esta jornada y que todo sea para bien de México”, dijo, luego de mandar su bendición a los presentes, a funcionarios y candidatos, “esperemos que todo sea en paz, que no haya situaciones difíciles y que las autoridades del INE puedan realizar su labor en santa paz”. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [ Más de dos horas después de iniciada la jornada, todavía falta el 15% de instalación de casillas en Coahuila](https://vanguardia.com.mx/coahuila/mas-de-dos-horas-despues-de-iniciada-la-jornada-todavia-falta-el-15-de-instalacion-de-casillas-en-coahuila-BE12164454) Ante la división que ha generado en los mexicanos estos comicios, debido a la tensión que genera el apoyo a diferentes partidos políticos, así como la disidencia de quienes se encuentran informes con el panorama político mexicano en general, el titular de la Diócesis de Saltillo invitó a sanar. “Hay que sanar, hay que conciliar lo mejor posible, creo que ninguna fractura, a causa de un partido o una opción ideológica, vale la pena en un país donde queremos salir adelante juntos”, expresó, “a través del diálogo, la conciliación, que podamos poner de nuestra parte”. Asimismo, en referencia a los asesinatos y atentados que han sucedido contra candidatos en México, comentó lo siguiente: “Cuando recurrimos a la agresión y hasta a la [muerte](https://vanguardia.com.mx/noticias/apuntaria-muerte-de-2-hermanitos-en-nl-a-intoxicacion-con-comida-china-no-con-pollo-maton-OE12162936), quiere que decir que hemos perdido de vista qué buscamos para nuestro país, ojalá que eso se vaya quitando poco a poco”, dijo, antes de exhortar a aceptar los resultados conforme a la ley y a seguir “seguir jalando”.

author: SIC Notícias
title: Fim de semana de aguaceiros e trovoada no Norte e Centro - SIC Notícias
text: O tempo de verão não vai continuar no fim de semana. Pelo menos não no Norte e Centro do país, onde é prevista a ocorrência de aguaceiros e trovoada. Para o sul, está prevista uma "pequena descida" da temperatura máxima. As previsões são do [Instituto Português do Mar e da Atmosfera](https://www.ipma.pt/pt/index.html) (IPMA), que adianta que os aguaceiros e trovoada podem começar durante a tarde desta sexta-feira no Norte e Centro. Os aguaceiros são mais prováveis no interior e em zonas de montanha, e podem ser acompanhados de granizo e trovoada. No sábado, estão previstos aguaceiros na região Norte, estendendo-se ao Centro a partir da tarde. Assim como no dia anterior, podem ser fortes e acompanhados de granizo e trovoada. Para estas regiões está prevista ainda uma "pequena descida" da temperatura máxima, em especial no litoral. A Sul, o céu estará pouco nublado ou limpo e o vento fraco a moderado, aumentando de intensidade a partir da tarde no litoral oeste e terras altas. Está ainda prevista uma "pequena descida" da temperatura máxima. Para domingo, o IPMA prevê a continuação dos aguaceiros, no interior Norte e Centro, e uma "pequena descida" de temperatura, no litoral destas regiões.

author: sina.com.cn
title: 开源证券孟鹏飞：人形机器人是通用AI的最佳载体|机器人_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
孟鹏飞 　　◎林玉莲
　　“人形 机器人 是通用AI的最佳载体。”4月1日，开源证券机械行业首席分析师孟鹏飞在“智启人形·聚势未来”上证·长三角科创沙龙上表示，人形机器人的核心在于人工智能（AI）。例如，特斯拉通过构建一个完整的AI体系，解决了人形机器人“大脑”和“灵魂”的问题。
　　这一体系包括自动驾驶系统（FSD）、超算集群等技术，形成了类似“大脑皮层”的智能架构。“一旦这套系统成熟，软件的边际成本将趋近于零。”孟鹏飞说。
　　孟鹏飞认为，人形机器人有可能成为科技史上第一个出货量超过手机、单价超过汽车的产品。在特斯拉CEO马斯克的畅想中，人形机器人规模有望达百万台。从商业原理上看，如果一个产品能稳定地制造并销售100万台，就意味着它已完全成熟。
　　谈及人形机器人量产节点，孟鹏飞预计：“从0台到1万台可能需要3到5年时间，从1万台到10万台需要2到3年，从10万台到100万台可能只需1到2年，而从100万台到1000万台可能只需半年。”
　　“本质上说这是批量复制的逻辑。”在孟鹏飞看来，随着技术成熟和产能扩张，人形机器人在单位时间内的生产规模一定会指数级增长，实现快速扩张。
　　一段时间以来，人形机器人供应链上市公司新建产能、扩产等消息不断。
　　孟鹏飞认为，人形机器人的核心部件，如电机、减速器、丝杠、轴承、轻量化结构件等，是机器人产业的基础，同时也是高端制造业亟待突破的瓶颈。这意味着，人形机器人供应链环节的突破，有望复用至整个制造业，推进制造业向高端化迈进。当前，此类核心零部件和材料的下游产品生产规模相当庞大，但整体质量仍有较大提升空间。即便短期内人形机器人尚未实现重大技术突破，这些硬件技术的持续进步，本身也将为制造业带来显著增益。
　　当前，市场高度关注什么样的企业能够做好人形机器人，以及有哪些国产企业值得关注。孟鹏飞认为有三个核心因素：首先，企业需要具备非常强的AI能力；其次，要有产业链资源整合能力；最后，要有明确的应用场景，例如特斯拉自带场景，能够建立起完整的生态。“华为、小米、小鹏、大疆等中国企业，都具备像特斯拉一样建立生态的能力。”孟鹏飞说。
　　在投资层面，人形机器人供应链中有哪些环节值得关注？孟鹏飞看好三个板块：
　　一是之前产业应用较少，仅有少数玩家参与，但因人形机器人产业发展而快速扩容的环节，包括行星滚珠丝杠、六维力传感器、触觉传感器、微型电机和微传动系统等。
　　二是原本已存在产业应用，在人形机器人产业带动下快速扩容的环节，如编码器、减速器、无框力矩电机等。
　　三是一些比较通用的部件，包括轴承、结构件、线束连接器、电池等。
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology
Economy, Business and Finance->products and services

author: Middle East Media Research Institute
title: Hamas And Other Palestinian Factions React To Norway, Ireland, And Spain Recognizing Palestinian State: It Validates Legitimacy Of Jihad And Armed Resistance | MEMRI
text: Hamas and other Palestinian terrorist groups were quick to praise the decision made by Norway, Ireland and Spain to recognize a Palestinian state, asserting that this decision is the result of the resistance and of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood (the October 7, 2023 Hamas-led massacres in southern Israel, in which over 1,200 Israelis were killed and over 240 were taken hostage). The Palestine Resistance Committees, a terror group operating in the Gaza Strip under Hamas, stated that recognition of Palestine constitutes support for the jihad of the Palestinian people and confirms that armed resistance is the way to attain international support and resist occupation. The Palestinian organizations called on the other countries of the world to follow the example of Norway, Ireland and Spain by recognizing a Palestinian state. Al-Jazeera report titled "Hamas: We Call on Countries to Recognize Our National Rights and Support the Struggle of Our Palestinian People" (Facebook.com/AJA.Palestine, May 22, 2024) Below are excerpts from the responses published by Hamas and other terror groups to the decision of the three countries. Hamas Officials: The European States' Recognition Of Palestine Is the Result Of The Resistance And The Al-Aqsa Flood A statement published by Hamas reads: "We welcome the recognition of the State of Palestine by Norway, Ireland and Spain, and we view this as an important step towards realizing our rights on our land and establishing our independent Palestinian state with Jerusalem as its capital. We call on countries throughout the world to recognize our legitimate national rights and to support the struggle of our Palestinian nation towards liberation and independence and towards the end of the Zionist occupation of our lands." [[1]](https://www.memri.org/reports/hamas-and-other-palestinian-factions-react-norway-ireland-and-spain-recognizing-palestinian#_edn1) SUPPORT OUR WORK Hamas official Husam Badran told Al-Jazeera Mubasher: "We welcome the recognition of a Palestinian state by Norway, Ireland and Spain, and we see this as a step in the right direction." He stated further: "The European states' recognition of Palestine is the result of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood and the steadfastness of the resistance." [[2]](https://www.memri.org/reports/hamas-and-other-palestinian-factions-react-norway-ireland-and-spain-recognizing-palestinian#_edn2) Hamas official Bassem Na'im told the Saudi daily Al-Sharq that the recognition is "a historic turning point" for the Palestinian cause on the international level, particularly in Europe, and added: "This will certainly encourage many countries to recognize Palestine as an independent state." He continued: "In the name of Hamas and the Palestinian people in the homeland and in the diaspora, we express our gratitude for the political courage shown by these countries despite the great pressure from the Zionist entity and its supporters around the world." He stressed: "The consecutive recognitions [of a Palestinian state] are the direct result of the brave resistance and the legendary steadfastness of our people." This, he elaborated, constitutes a "turning point in the international community with regard to the Palestinian cause, and it will contribute to the lifting of the siege imposed by the Israeli entity and its supporters." [[3]](https://www.memri.org/reports/hamas-and-other-palestinian-factions-react-norway-ireland-and-spain-recognizing-palestinian#_edn3) Palestine Resistance Committees: Recognition Of Palestine Constitutes Support For Jihad And Proof That Military And Armed Resistance Is The Correct Path The Palestine Resistance Committees, a Gaza-based Palestinian terror group that operates in the Gaza Strip and is subordinate to Hamas, also published a statement on the subject, which said: "We welcome the announcement by Norway, Ireland and Spain about the recognition of the State of Palestine, and view this as an important step towards the international [community] freely uniting in support of our Palestinian nation in its land and also supporting its struggle, its jihad and its resistance, [which has been] the crown jewel of our nation's struggle for over 100 years. "The Irish, Norwegian and Spanish recognition of the State of Palestine grants legitimacy to the resistance of our nation in confronting the crimes and massacres of the Zionist gangs that are occupying our land. This is a high-quality change in the stance of Europe, which has begun to understand the truth about the Zionist colonialist entity. "This important and valued step validates that practical resistance on all levels – military, armed, media, and so forth – is the [correct] path towards coalescing the freedom-lovers of the world around our nation's rights, towards supporting these rights, and towards rejecting the Zionist occupation and aggression against our nation, our land and our holy places. We call on the other countries of the world, and particularly the Arab and Islamic [countries], to immediately recognize our national rights, to support the struggle of our Palestinian nation for liberation and independence, and to end the Zionist aggression on the land of Palestine, which has been continuing since the Nakba." [[4]](https://www.memri.org/reports/hamas-and-other-palestinian-factions-react-norway-ireland-and-spain-recognizing-palestinian#_edn4) PFLP: The Recognition Of The State Of Palestine Is The Result Of Our Nation's Resistance The Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine (PFLP) published a statement saying: "[We] welcome the announcement by Ireland, Spain and Norway recognizing the State of Palestine and we see this as an advanced historic step which comes as a result of the resistance of our nation and our legendary steadfastness against the most despicable occupation that history has ever known. [This recognition] is the result of the important shifts in international opinion and of the widespread solidarity of the masses with Palestine, particularly in Europe and northern and southern America. The PFLP calls on all the countries of the world to emulate this important step on the path to actually realizing this [Palestinian] state as a practical reality on the ground, [and this] by recognizing the full, legitimate and eternal rights of the Palestinian people, expeling the Zionist occupation from our land and establishing a sovereign Palestinian state on all the territory of our homeland, with Jerusalem as its capital." [[5]](https://www.memri.org/reports/hamas-and-other-palestinian-factions-react-norway-ireland-and-spain-recognizing-palestinian#_edn5)

author: Bill O'Reilly
title: No Diversity
text:
A study out of Syracuse University says just 3.4 percent of practicing journalists in the USA are Republicans. And the only reason the number is that high is Fox News. At the other agencies, the number of GOPers hovers around zero.
Why?
First, some disclosure. I am a registered Independent. In my experience, neither party serves the people the way they should. We need problem-solvers in this country, not party apparatchiks.
Right now, the Democratic Party is hurting the nation big time, so it's Republicans for me by default.
Socialism, open borders, timid foreign policy, and failure to stem social disorder are bad things. Legalized pot is stupid. Unfettered abortion is amazingly immoral. Being pro-criminal and anti-cop is insane.
Diversity, equity, and inclusion are ruining the American higher education system.
Democrats support all of the above.
We have returned to 1860 when the Democratic Party despised Abraham Lincoln's anti-slavery posture. A rational, compassionate, patriotic person would have had a hard time defending Democrats back then.
History will eventually show a similar situation as we approach 2024: a weak, feckless president doing the bidding of the radical left.
And journalists are fine with that because of one tired cliche: "Don't ... Bite ... The ... Hand ... That ... Feeds ... You."
Media companies are run by liberal boards as well as managers. And if you're a Republican, they don't want you.
That will drive down"diversity" every time.
Hope you are enjoying the season.
